Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: This place is heavenly. My husband and I make it to Amsterdam atleast once a year and we always come here to stock up. The bottles and overall quality is just impeccable.   Can't wait until you start shipping!!!! ♥️♥️♥️

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Fantastic selection of Genever, friendly bartender willing to help me try out some new drinks. Feels like a nice neighborhood bar.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Really nice place. The barman is very welcoming and takes his time to explain all there is to know about dutch alcohol. The choice on the menu is huge and the place is so nice.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Classic old school pub serving genever & amstel. Very friendly and welcoming staff. Local pub for local people but v receptive of the tourist. V good prices too for Amsterdam

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Very nice little pub, staff were very friendly always smiling and extremely helpful when helping me choose a Dutch Gin. I recommend trying the korenwijn zuidam.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Old school bar. Unique and autentic decoration. Not for everyone.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Changed ownership about 2 months ago, but new owners and staff are very welcoming and have kept most of the old decor and still specialize in jenever and liqueurs. Lovely place and one of my favorites in Amsterdam.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: An oasis of quiet, old-world charm and Dutch Whisky (more like whisky than gin!!), the "old man / local pub" that seems impossible to find amongst the tourist traps, but it is there. Anyone serving you will be highly knowledgeable and warm. …

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Intimate, old-time bar that specializes in Dutch genever (gin). The bartender is extremely knowledgeable and friendly and will help you choose some of the different liquor or beer options they have on tap. This bar is a bit of an oddity in …

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: One of the most special and quintessential places in Amsterdam. So happy to have wandered upon it ! A gem in a neighborhood that has changed around it; continues to serve mainly Dutch patrons. Cozy, old, authentic, excellent home small batch jenevere. I enjoy the 3 year (tastes like whiskey) lovely staff.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: A charming, old traditional Dutch bar that serves many varieties of Jenever and tons of Dutch liqueur options. Absolutely loved the place and bartender is really sweet who helped us with the different options. We even bought some Jenever and apple cinnamon liqueur.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Totally loved it.  Vanilla or cinnamon liquer on a cold day in Amsterdam really warms you up.  This place feels like you've stepped back in time.  Highly recommend.  Very friendly staff and other clientele too.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Lovely selection of Gins served by a nice young lady. Loses 3 stars because of the attitude of the miserable old woman who runs the place. Absolutely rude & arrogant old cow!!!! She was doing a tasting in another room and came into the bar …

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: I love this place. It is a place where you can have a great gin (Dutch: jenever) and have a conversation with friends or family without music as background. This is a very old place to taste many, many different jenevers and other funny named drinks.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: This is a very nice place with a great selection of interesting drinks.  The barman was friendly and very helpful even if like me you know very little about the drinks on offer.  There really is a huge selection.  You will enjoy it here.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Exceptional. Wonderful cosy, characterful venue with comfortable surroundings and lots to look at. Kind, helpful service remarkable for quite a busy, touristic area. In all ways a pub as well as a jenever tasting room, with no regard given for choice of drink partaken. A must visit and a special place.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: We came here at 5pm today at a friend's suggestion (when we were the only patrons) and had a drink. They said the singing didn't start till 8 so we went for dinner and came back. I guess they didn't like the fact that we had our kid with us …

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: One of the oldest pubs in Amsterdam.. 70 jenever to try but also serve beer. The barman is terrific and the clients are always friendly.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Very nice, informal, typical Amsterdam atmosphere -- bring plenty of 'kapsones'. Incredible selection of Dutch gins/jenevers, served by a knowledgeable host.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: An incredible old Genever Bar, with huge selection of vintage spirits. Do your self a favour and order the Bols Korenwijn 10yo with a beer chaser. You're welcome.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: We stopped in by random chance and had a great time.  The sweet man behind the bar explained all the liquor and was so welcoming!  Highly recommend a stop in for a drink!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: It's like going back in time when you enter the bar. Great beer selection and homemade (down in the basement) liqors. Staff is very friendly.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: If you fancy gin or limoncello, jenever might also be your cup of tea. The friendly owner and his staff are happy to give a personal recommendation based on your taste.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Very friendly locals, excellent selection of really high quality jenevers. My favourite bar from a rapid tour of 8ish on a Saturday afternoon in Amsterdam.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: very good drink and atmosphere.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Small batch jenever distillery. Cozy, quaint, and definitely a place to visit for a Dutch experience. Close to Amsterdam Central.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Great traditional Dutch bar, with excellent variety of drinks available, including some made on the premises. You really need to try it!!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Love the Olofsport and always make a point of visiting when in Amsterdam. Good beer and a very fine selection of Jenever!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Great service and the lovely woman behind the bar gave us a bit of history of the place. Nice beer - local vibe

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Quaint and cozy. This place oozes atmosphere in it's little footprint. You almost slip back in time when you enter out of the fray of the world.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: A very quiet (no TV or music) and cozy place with a huge variety of amazing liqueurs! Highly recommend!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: taste various dutch gin and liquors in a centuries old monument building. Ask for the staffs there for advise.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: special place to taste a great variety of gins and liqueurs —and singing!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Super pub, lovely and cosy and the bartender is super friendly and very knowledgeable about the history of the building.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Great place for a traveler to visit and experience distilled spirits not found in the US!!!!   Very hospitable!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: great typically Dutch brown cafe, with great genebras and other liquors made by them

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Good atmosphere. Friendly staff. Enjoy the Dutch steak here.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: The best spot for jenever. In the very centre of the city but not very touristic.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Sample local jenevers and korenwijns. Zuidam 5yo jenever is a must!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Friendly bar man. Amazing old world feel and  a great selection of drinks.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Nice place, great staff, excellent selection of drinks

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Raymond is incredible! Everyone loves this place & the Genever selections are the best.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Should be on everyones to visit list

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Excellent introduction to Jenever

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Excellent place! Best home made jenever ever!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Amazing brown bar. Live music and great atmosphere

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Great place for the Jenever (dutch gin)

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: A haven of tranquility and amazing beers, whiskeys and jenevers!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: A real hidden gem in Amsterdam. Worth a visit and a few drams.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Very lovely place :-)

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Great selection of Genefer.  Friendly and helpful staff.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Excellent Genever and a friendly attitude, please swing by, cheers!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Great lager beer from eastern Holland!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Excellent replacement for Café de Dam.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Tasting tray of genevas available with friendly service

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: The best Gin bar in Amsterdam.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Brown pub style, great time.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: A quiet, intimate little bar, full of character!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Great place for old jenever

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: The best quite place for a real genever

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Great selection of jenevers.

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: The knowledge of the bartender is impressive!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: A real good relaxing spot

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Very cozy place!!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Great selection of spirits

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: The best janever!

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: Cozy, intimate and unique

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: TOP

Name: In de Olofspoort
Review Text: I will be back
